attributes.action: Remove the EU Law on Local Bus Services over 55km
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the Prime Minister to veto the EU Law on Local bus services over 55km

Currently any local bus service which operates a route over 55km, the driver has to record his driving hours by using a Tachograph.

This Petition is to ask the prime minister to look into this matter and the the law overturned.

The law currently resticts bus companies and drivers of delivering a better service for passengers.

The Current EU Law is meant for Long Distance journeys. NOT local bus Services.
